description: Lenart Kova enters Council Sector E under Harmonist escort to repair a malfunctioning smart mirror. He spots encrypted, rapidly erasing messages hidden in the diagnostics logs, signed "MH/37-A".

Initial analysis of the smart mirror points to insider tampering within the Council security perimeter. Faction leaders order urgent loyalty checks and temporarily restrict data access in sensitive departments.
A detailed examination reveals the messages contained instructions for bypassing BCI override protocols, with data trails implicating possible senior-level sabotage linked to prior BCI malfunctions.
Council factions debate over the scope of the internal breach. Directorate officials call for immediate suspensions, while Harmonists push for quiet containment and further investigation.

Rumors and partial leaks about sabotage and Council disloyalty spread to public forums. News of abrupt demotions and BCI score drops for some leaders causes fresh uncertainty and stirs distrust among citizens.
